caption.p: Schematic diagram of genomic organization of SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV, and SARS-CoV.2. a The genomic regions or open-reading frames (ORFs) are compared. b Structural proteins, including spike (S), envelope (E), membrane (M) and nucleocapsid (N) proteins, as well as non-structural proteins translated from ORF 1a and ORF 1b and accessory (A) proteins are indicated for SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV and SARS-CoV2
